name: Easy Ad Placement – for AdSense and other Ads
author: Jens Herdy

sections.description:
Please use the new and better Plugin “Easy Code Pleacement”. – https://wordpress.org/plugins/easy-code-placement/
This Plugin will not be Supported anymore. “Easy Code Pleacement” is completely rewritten with better handling and a modern Layout.

Easy Ad Placement provides a very easy way to place Ads where you want to have them.

Features

  • Save up to 10 Ads on options page
  • Set the alignement of the Add
  • Place a Ad with a Shortcode
  • Place a Ad with a PHP-Snippet
  • Ready for translations

Languages

  • Englisch
  • German
sections.installation:
In WordPress

  • Download the Plugin
  • Go in your Dashboard to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Install’
  • Click on Upload
  • Click on ‘Choose file’ and choose the downloaded Zip-file
  • Click on ‘Install’
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • Now you can go to the Settings-Page on ‘Settings’ -> ‘Easy Ad Placement’

Manually

  • Go in your Dashboard to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Install’
  • Search for ‘Easy Ad Placement’
  • Click on ‘Install’
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • Now you can go to the Settings-Page on ‘Settings’ -> ‘Easy Ad Placement’
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • 18.10.2014
  • Install Notes Edited
  • Added the Information about “Easy Code Placement”
  • No Support for this Plugin anymore

1.3

  • 24.05.2014
  • FIX: Fixed Bug wich caused the lost of the settings after Update
  • New Feature: Deleting Options when performing Uninstall.
  • Install Notes Edited
  • Compressed the Code
  • Added a Donate Button to Options

1.2

  • 23.05.2014
  • Description edited
  • New Feature: Set the Alignment of Ads
  • Updated German translation

1.1

  • 22.05.2014
  • Added Localisations (German)

1.0

  • 21.05.2014
  • First Release (Stable)
